title: Online Interaction-Based Social Field Graduate Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level social science theory and research methodology
context.additional_context: A long-term research project conducted online, where learners independently analyze data and produce outcomes using collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design one or more research topics in the social sciences by utilizing digital library resources.
Learners can complete project deliverables reflecting peer feedback three or more times using online interaction tools (forums, video conferences, etc.).
Learners can communicate with team members at least twice weekly via an online collaboration platform to draft a final report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
